entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0011.9292] It is expected that TreasuryStockCommonValue with a value of 0 reported in the network role http://www.readingrdi.com/role/DisclosureStockBasedCompensationAndStockRepurchasesNarrativeDetails should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:TreasuryStockCommonMember and a reported value of -40,407,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://www.readingrdi.com/role/DisclosureNonControllingInterestsSummaryOfChangesInControllingAndNonControllingStockholdersEquityDetails. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:TreasuryStockCommonValue fact are:
Period : 2024-09-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of TreasuryStockCommonValue : 0 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -3 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rdi-20240930x10qa.htm 59
